name: Monster Buster Club
description:
Monster Buster Club is a racing-arcade game developed by Nordcurrent. It came out on 28-02-2011. It was published by Nordcurrent.
Monster Buster Club is available on Nintendo DS.
David Michel, Sylvain Viau and Vincent Chalvon-Demersay produced the game. Jean-Louis Vandestoc, John Stocker and Michael Donovan directed the game. Jeff Fisher and Paul-Etienne Cote scored the game.
